A variation of the [[Chidori]] that uses [[shape transformation]] to create countless sharp [[senbon]] that are fired at the enemy in quick succession. By increasing the amount of [[chakra]] used, the number of senbon increase proportionally. When used in tandem with the [[Sharingan]], it becomes far more effective and deadly, as it allows the user to precisely shoot for the target's vital points.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden the Movie: Bonds]]'', Sasuke's precision with this technique proved advanced enough to accurately hit the [[tenketsu]].
